scripts.setup: npm run clean:files & npm install --force && npm run install:extra
scripts.clean:files: rd /s /q build & rd /s /q jetpack_vendor & rd /s /q node_modules & rd /s /q vendor & del /f /q composer.lock & del /f /q package-lock.json
scripts.install:extra: composer install && composer dump-autoload && husky install
scripts.build:zip: npm run build && rd /s /q $npm_package_name.zip && Compress-Archive -Path $npm_package_name.zip -DestinationPath src
